original_title: Prime Land Residencies shines once again
original_body_lines: Prime Land Residencies, the trailblazing leading real estate developer, has once again proven its exceptional standing in the industry by securing a coveted position among Sri Lanka’s ‘Most Valuable Consumer Brands’ for 2023, based on the annual review by Brand Finance, the renowned brand valuation consultancy, conducted in collaboration with LMD.

The Brand Finance: LMD 2023 Annual Review of Sri Lanka’s 100 Most Valuable Brands, recognises Prime Residencies as a mover and shaker having climbed four notches from last year’s list to be placed at No. 60. Importantly, Prime Residences was also crowned the ‘Most Valuable Real Estate Consumer Brand’ for the Real Estate sector, achieving a significant milestone and underscoring the company’s steadfast dedication to delivering unparalleled quality and value to customers in the real estate market.

Embracing the theme of ‘The Courage to Change,’ the report takes a closer look at the transformation and adaptability displayed by leading brands in the face of dynamic market challenges. In a year under review (2022) that saw significant disruptions, Prime Land Residencies demonstrated resilience, agility, and a forward-looking approach that has propelled success.

Prime Group Co-Chairperson Sandamini Perera stated, “We are immensely proud to be recognized as a top valuable brand and the best of the best in the real estate sector, yet again. The acknowledgement highlights Prime Land Residencies’ firm dedication to delivering unparalleled quality and value to its customers and also serves as a testament to the hard work and dedication of our team. We will continue to embrace change, challenge conventions, and innovate to offer exceptional experiences to our customers while redefining modern living and setting new benchmarks for the real estate sector.”

Brand Finance: LMD’s annual assessment is widely regarded as a credible and comprehensive barometer of brand performance in Sri Lanka. The ranking considers various factors, including brand strength, revenue, and customer loyalty, providing an invaluable insight into the nation’s most influential brands.

To date, Prime Residencies has won numerous awards consecutively, including the Most Respected Real Estate Organization and Most Awarded Real Estate Entity by LMD. In addition, Great Place to Work has recognized the company for six years as a team that works with commitment, passion, and purpose.With over 27 years of experience and 45 luxury apartments in its vast portfolio, Prime Land Residencies continues to chart a path of excellence, committed to redefining the real estate landscape.
